summary: AN ORDINANCE retitling, reclassifying and fixing compensation for certain positions in the Engineering Department; authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding with the International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 17, amending Appendix "B" of the collective bargaining agreement between the City and the Union for Professional, Technical, Senior Business, Senior Professional, Recreation Specialist, and Human Rights Field Representative units, which is effective through August 31, 1989; and providing payment therefor.
